citation.article-title: Proposal to replace the illegitimate genus name Bryantella Wolin et al. 2004 VP with the genus name Marvinbryantia gen. nov. and to replace the illegitimate combination Bryantella formatexigens Wolin et al. 2004 VP with Marvinbryantia formatexigens comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Marvinbryantia formatexigens comb. nov.
Marvinbryantia formatexigens (for.mat.exâ€²i.gens. N.L. n. formas -atis formate, L. part. adj. exigens demanding; N.L. fem. part. adj. formatexigens formate-demanding).
Illegitimate homotypic synonym: Bryantella formatexigens Wolin et al. 2004.
The description of the species is as given for Bryantella formatexigens by Wolin et al. (2003).
